Delivery Portal CLI¶

Installation¶

How to install it.

code_api.dp_cli currently because in “wrong” directory. Need to adjust docs to be in cli directory.

Usage¶

code_api.dp_cli¶

code_api.dp_cli [OPTIONS] COMMAND [ARGS]...

get¶

Downloads the files from S3 bucket. Not usable by facilities.

code_api.dp_cli get [OPTIONS]

Options

-c, --config <config>¶

Path to config file containing e.g. username, password, project id, etc.

-u, --username <username>¶

Delivery Portal username.

-pw, --password <password>¶

Delivery Portal password.

-p, --project <project>¶

Project to upload files to.

-f, --pathfile <pathfile>¶

Path to file containing all files and folders to be uploaded.

-d, --data <data>¶

Path to file or folder to upload.

put¶

Uploads the files to S3 bucket. Only usable by facilities.

code_api.dp_cli put [OPTIONS]

Options

-c, --config <config>¶

Path to config file containing e.g. username, password, project id, etc.

-u, --username <username>¶

Delivery Portal username.

-pw, --password <password>¶

Delivery Portal password.

-p, --project <project>¶

Project to upload files to.

-f, --pathfile <pathfile>¶

Path to file containing all files and folders to be uploaded.

-d, --data <data>¶

Path to file or folder to upload.

Contents¶

Main¶

Command line interface for Data Delivery Portal

dp_api.code_api.dp_cli.all_data(data_file: str) → tuple¶

Puts all data from data file into one tuple.

Parameters

data_file – Path to file containing paths to files which will be uploaded.

Returns

All paths to the files.

Return type

tuple

dp_api.code_api.dp_cli.check_access(login_info: dict) → str¶

Checks the users access to the delivery portal and the specified project, and the projects S3 access.

Parameters

login_info – Dictionary containing username, password and project ID.

Returns

User ID connected to the specified user.

Return type

str

dp_api.code_api.dp_cli.compression_dict() → dict¶

Creates a dictionary of compressed types.

Returns

All mime types regarded as compressed formats

Return type

dict

dp_api.code_api.dp_cli.couch_connect() → couchdb.client.Server¶

Connects to a couchdb interface. Currently hard-coded.

Returns

CouchDB server instance.

Return type

couchdb.client.Server

dp_api.code_api.dp_cli.create_directories(tdir: str, paths: tuple) → bool¶

Creates all temporary directories.

Parameters

  • tdir – Path to new temporary directory

  • paths – Tuple containing all data-file paths

Returns

True if directories created

Return type

bool

dp_api.code_api.dp_cli.file_type(fpath: str) -> (<class 'str'>, <class 'str'>, <class 'bool'>, <class 'str'>)¶

Guesses file mime.

Parameters

fpath – Path to file.

dp_api.code_api.dp_cli.get_current_time() → str¶

Gets the current time. Formats timestamp.

Returns

Timestamp in format ‘YY-MM-DD_HH-MM-SS’

Return type

str

dp_api.code_api.dp_cli.process_file(file: str, s3_resource, user: dict, temp_dir: str, sub_dir: str = '') → dict¶

Handles processing of files including compression and encryption.

Parameters

  • file – File to be uploaded

  • temp_dir – Temporary directory

  • sub_dir – Sub directory within temp_dir

  • s3_resource – The users S3 login credentials

Returns

Information about final files, checksums, errors etc.

Return type

dict

dp_api.code_api.dp_cli.process_folder(folder: str, s3_resource, user: dict, temp_dir: str, sub_dir: str = '') → dict¶

Handles processing of folders. Opens folders and redirects to file processing function.

Parameters

  • folder – Path to folder

  • temp_dir – Temporary directory

  • sub_dir – Current sub directory within temp_dir

  • s3_resource –

Returns

Information abut final files, checksums, errors etc.

Return type

dict

dp_api.code_api.dp_cli.project_access(user: str, project: str) → bool¶

Checks the users access to a specific project.

Parameters

  • user – User ID.

  • project – ID of project that the user is requiring access to.

Returns

True if project access granted

Return type

bool

dp_api.code_api.dp_cli.secure_password_hash(password_settings: str, password_entered: str) → str¶

Generates secure password hash.

Parameters

  • password_settings – String containing the salt, length of hash, n-exponential, r and p variables. Taken from database. Separated by ‘$’.

  • password_entered – The user-specified password.

Returns

The derived hash from the user-specified password.

Return type

str

dp_api.code_api.dp_cli.verify_user_credentials(config: str, username: str, password: str, project: str) -> (<class 'str'>, <class 'str'>, <class 'str'>)¶

Checks that the correct options and credentials are entered.

Parameters

  • config – File containing the users DP username and password, and the project relating to the upload/download. Can be used instead of inputing the credentials separately.

  • username – Username for DP log in.

  • password – Password connected to username.

  • project – Project ID.

Returns

A tuple containing three strings

Username (str)

Password (str)

Project ID (str)

Return type

tuple

Exceptions¶

Exceptions

exception dp_api.code_api.dp_exceptions.AuthenticationError(msg: str)¶

Custom exception class. Handles errors regarding delivery portal authentications.

exception dp_api.code_api.dp_exceptions.CompressionError(msg: str)¶

Errors related to compression operations.

exception dp_api.code_api.dp_exceptions.CouchDBException(msg: str)¶

Custom exception class. Handles errors in database operations.

exception dp_api.code_api.dp_exceptions.DataException(msg: str)¶

Errors related to the data entered as an option

exception dp_api.code_api.dp_exceptions.DeliveryOptionException(msg: str)¶

Custom exception class. Handles errors regarding data delivery options (s3 delivery) etc.

exception dp_api.code_api.dp_exceptions.DeliveryPortalException(msg: str)¶

Custom exception class. Handles errors regarding Delivery Portal access etc

exception dp_api.code_api.dp_exceptions.EncryptionError(msg: str)¶

Handles errors regarding data encryption.

exception dp_api.code_api.dp_exceptions.HashException(msg: str)¶

Handles errors regarding checksum generation.

exception dp_api.code_api.dp_exceptions.SecurePasswordException(msg: str)¶

Custom exception class. Handles errors regarding password retrieval and handling.

exception dp_api.code_api.dp_exceptions.StreamingError(msg: str)¶

Custom exception class. Handles errors regarding streaming file contents.
